home.hero beschreibung: We are a climate organization that is passionately committed to reducing emissions from companies.
home.Wilkommen Heading: Together for a green future - Transparency creates responsibility!
home.Wilkommen text: We are a climate organization that is passionately committed to disclosing emissions from companies and countries. Our goal is to contribute to responsible decision-making by providing comprehensive data and information on the impact on the climate.
home.Transparenz-Beschr: By disclosing emissions from companies and countries, we advocate for an honest and comprehensive assessment.
home.Integrität-Beschr: We conduct our assessments with the highest accuracy and objectivity to provide reliable data and strengthen trust in our work.
home.Innovation-Bechr: Innovation drives us to find new ways to address climate change. We constantly seek creative solutions to bring about positive change.
home.Emissione-Text: We conduct our assessments with the highest accuracy and objectivity to provide reliable data and strengthen trust in our work.
home.Kontakt-Text: Do you have questions, suggestions or would you like to collaborate with us? Feel free to contact us! We look forward to hearing from you and working together to make a difference for climate protection.

emissionen.Hero-text: Focus on emissions data from companies and countries
emissionen.Quote: We publish emissions data from companies and countries to create transparency and raise awareness of the impact on the climate
emissionen.Kontakt-text: Do you have questions, suggestions, or would you like to collaborate with us? Feel free to contact us! We look forward to hearing from you and working together to make a difference for climate protection.
